email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. I have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can lower the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton, but that’s the best I can do given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton. Please confirm the laycan remains October 15-20 and that the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day. Once confirmed, we can proceed with the fixture. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for October 15-20, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day. I’ll prepare the fixture recap and send it over for your review. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Please send over the fixture recap, and we’ll review it promptly. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John
